name: Elevator (jpcerrone)
description:
Controls: 

Numbers 0 to 9 on the keyboard. 

It's reccomended to play on the numpad if you have one.

You're the mine's elevator operator. Your job is to pick up and drop the workers as fast as you can before their patience runs out.

Made in two weeks for the 2023 Black&White jam.

Author:

Programming, art and music by Juan Cerrone. Follow me here If you like my work :)
